sentences.en: Having worked round the clock , I'm completely knackered.
sentences.cn: 忙了一天一夜, 我累得筋疲力尽.

sentences.en: I was absolutely knackered at the end of the match.
sentences.cn: 在比赛结束时我体力完全透支了。

sentences.en: I'm completely knackered I ran all the way!
sentences.cn: 我累坏了--我是跑着来的!

sentences.en: Some of the nurses would come in knackered after a day on A&E, strip till two in the morning and then go home.
sentences.cn: 有些当护士的在医院急诊室里工作了一整天，筋疲力尽地跑到会所跳舞跳到凌晨2点，然后才回家。

trans.tran_cn: 杀死，使筋疲力尽( knacker的过去式和过去分词 )
